welcome_page_subtitle: The fidelity's assistant that cares about privacy
on_boarding_username_title: Nice to meet you, how do your friends call you ?
on_boarding_sex_and_age_title: With Carl, these informations will never be linked to your identity ! You will be, for the merchants, an anonymous user.
empty_cards_description: Click on button to start scanning your first card !
empty_good_deals_description: Here will be the future good deals provided by pros !
network_error_description: It appears that you are no connected to internet. Retrieving of content unvailable for the moment.
login_page_title: Do you already have a Carl account ?
on_boarding_email_title: In order to identify you, I also need your mail. It will never be communicated to professionals ;)
on_boarding_password_title: A little password for more securitry !
on_boarding_password_uppercase_error: Your password must have 1 uppercase char and 1 number
email_already_exist_error_message: Email already exists on this application, please choose another
log_out_confirmation_description: Are you sure you want to quit ?
scan_page_title: Validate your visit by scanning the QR-code...
scan_limit_message: Today's scans limit reached for this merchant
deletion_dialog_description:
In order to respect your private data, we'll delete the only data we have that is linked to your identity: your email's address
The history of your visits, among others, will still be stored because necessary for the businesses' statistics.
However, keep in mind that the only identity's reliable data we have is your email's address, which has never been (and will never been) given to pros accounts
deletion_dialog_important: The deletion of your account is definitive ! We'll never again be able to retrieve your data after their deletion.
